mapper.select: select e.emp_num, e.auth_code, e.emp_name, d. dept_code, d.dept_name, e.position_grade from employee e join department d on e.dept_code = d.dept_code where e.emp_num = ${emp_num} and BINARY e.emp_pw = '${emp_pw}';
mapper.insert: insert into login_history(emp_num, recent_datetime) values (#{emp_num}, now());
